import React, {useState, useEffect, useContext} from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import check from '../../../img/check.svg' function OrderDetails() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [history] = state.userAPI.history const [orderDetails, setOrderDetails] = useState([]) const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const params = useParams() useEffect(() => { if(params.id){ history.forEach(item =>{ if(item._id === params.id) setOrderDetails(item) }) } },[params.id, history]) if(orderDetails.length === 0) return null; return (

Payment DetailS

Name Address Postal Code Country Code
{orderDetails.address.recipient_name} {orderDetails.address.line1 + " - " + orderDetails.address.city} {orderDetails.address.postal_code} {orderDetails.address.country_code}

Thank toán thành công

Details

{ orderDetails.cart.map(item =>( )) }
Products Quantity Price
{item.title} {item.quantity} $ {item.price * item.quantity}

Shipping Details

Reciver shipping Address City phone number Status
{orderDetails.shipname} {orderDetails.shipaddress} {orderDetails.shipcity+"-"+orderDetails.shipstate} {orderDetails.shipphone} {orderDetails.shippingstatus}
) } export default OrderDetails
